#include<stdio.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
int main(){
int t;
long long int n,k;
double l,j;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--){
    scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
    if(k*(k+1)/2<n)
        printf("-1\n");
    else{
        j=(double)k*(k+1)-2.0*n;
        l=(double)(sqrt(1.0+4.0*j)-1.0)/2;
        printf("%lld\n",(long long)l);
    }


}
return 0;
}
